protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Genspring10 using GC-RMA and normalized to the mean of the Columbia 0 minute timepoints. ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized log2 ratio (test sample/median of Col_0min samples)

Dexamethasone was added to the liquid medium for a final concentration of 50�M and the tissue was flash-frozen at 30min, 60min, or 120min post-treatment. For the 0min samples, tissue was flash-frozen just before dexamethasone addition to the other samples.

For each sample, 50 seeds were sterilized in 0.6 % bleach and 0.07% SDS, cold-treated at 4˚C for 48hrs, and grown at 22˚C in 50 ml of MS medium with 1% sucrose for 7 days before treatment. 35S::GR-REV and 35S::KAN1-GR samples were grown at different times, with simultaneously grown Columbia wild-type controls for each (wild-type biorep 1-3 were grown on the same day as 35S:GR-REV, wild-type biorep 4-6 were grown on the same day as 35S:KAN1-GR). A sample was prepared in a separate flask for each timepoint rather than sampling over time from a single treated flask.

Total RNA was prepared using RNeasy columns from frozen, ground tissue according to the manufacturer (Qiagen). Qiashredder columns were used, with no more than 100mg of tissue per column. DNA was removed from the samples using the Ambion DNA-free kit according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 15�g total RNA.
20�g of cRNA was fragmented and hybridized on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Arrays for 16 hr at 45˚C. Chips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix GeneChip Fluidics Station 400.
Chips were scanned on an Agilent GeneArray Scanner G2500A and images were analyzed with Affymetrix GeneChip Operating Software.
